website_summaries.verdict: This dolly works like a traditional two-wheeled dolly with special attachments to hold your bucket in place.
pros: Can help you pull a bucket up stairs or over a curb
Great for carrying small propane tanks
cons: Only designed to hold about 85 lbs., which is less than some other dollies

customer_reviews.title: Works moving a 40 lb propane bottle.
customer_reviews.text: This same company has a propane bottle caddy. However, the company charges over $70.00 for the caddy. I bought this for $26.00. The good it moves the 40Lb. bottle. the bad, the weak buckle occasionaly pops loosethe wheels will not engage the ground and the base that the bottle sits on just drags. this feature is present on the high dollar modle also. So there is no qualitative difference other than price. Since I am older and the 40 Lb. bottles are becoming harder to move this helps greatly. Due to the flimsy nature and the price difference, I rated this a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Max Headroom

customer_reviews.title: Save your back!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for 5 gallon drywall buckets moving upstairs. Really saves your back. the product could have been constructed a little more substantially. I'm wondering if this product will hold up long term.
customer_reviews.author: George R

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to cart water buckets around my barn. I was hoping to be able to leave the buckets on the dollys but the handle prohibits my horses from drinking if the bucket is left in the cart. The other issue for me is that I was trying to avoid lifting full buckets but if you pull these dollys over anything but very flat ground the water sloshes out. The concept is great and I'm sure they are perfect for some uses for some people but they did not meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Consumer

customer_reviews.title: 99 FOR THIS CHEESY PIECE OF CRAP??
customer_reviews.text: $69.99 FOR THIS CHEESY PIECE OF CRAP?????? ARE YOU KIDDING??????? NOTHING BUT A CHEAP PIECE OF FLIMSY PLASTIC WITH A TIN HANDLE! BUYERS BEWARE!! NOT EVEN WORTHY OF ONE STAR!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J.

customer_reviews.title: It broke
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to help us move buckets of dirt in the yard and the very first time I used it ,it broke, the plastic part broke! Sad
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Soccio

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Locking mechanism not working after two weeks - Can’t be used to tilt the bucket anymore. I regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: John Galligan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well to move buckets of tools around just can't overload the buckets
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I had to lug a 50 pound tool bucket until I got the bucket buddy. It's the best tool ever!
customer_reviews.author: Zeb Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works greats, Helps for getting buckets out on old days. Also saves the back and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Winters

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device. Arrived on time and well packaged. Minimal assembly required.
customer_reviews.author: Metroh

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness
customer_reviews.text: I've used my Bucket Buggy all summer. As a property manager, I have to fix nearly everything, and I'm always hauling tools, plumbing supplies, paint, taping compound, and gardening supplies. The Bucket Buggy makes all my jobs much easier. This winter, I'll be keeping my ice melt salt and sand buckets on the Bucket Buggy. Thank goodness I won't have to carry it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Umbro C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes it easy to move heavy buckets. A huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Tessel

product_meta.title: Bucket Buggy Bucket Mover
product_meta.description: Style:Bucket CarrierUmbroTools is proud to present the first of many innovative tools that will make moving 5 gallon buckets weighing up to 85b lbs. or similar shaped and sized containers easier than you can imagine. Have you ever strained your back lifting a heavy 5 gallon bucket and transporting it from the garage to the garden, to the driveway, to your car? We have THE solution: the Bucket Buggy. The wonder of wheels designed with a base and handle that makes moving heavy 5 gallon buckets easily.
feature_bullets: BUCKET BUGGY - Innovative tool that makes moving 5 gallon buckets weighing up to 85b lbs. easier than you can imagine.
EASY TO CARRY - The handle of the Bucket Buggy curves symmetrically in an arc creating ease in carrying.
ADJUSTABLE - The Bucket Buggy can easily convert to a "skid" function letting the bucket remain vertical.
USE ON INCLINE - The "fenderbrakes"(R) of the Bucket Buggy allow it to be used on an incline.
SIMPLE TO STORE - To store the Bucket Buggy simply rotate the platform into a storage position up against the frame.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars24 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
